a8ef1d96-a375-4d5f-b2d5-69672a47288b.title: Romantic Paris Experience
a8ef1d96-a375-4d5f-b2d5-69672a47288b.description: Experience the romance and charm of Paris with our exclusive tour. This comprehensive package takes you through the most iconic landmarks, delightful dining experiences, and offers a glimpse into the artistic and cultural beauty that Paris is renowned for.
highlights: Visit to the Eiffel Tower with priority access
Guided tour of the Louvre Museum
Explore the charming neighborhood of Montmartre
Experience a classic Parisian cabaret show

itinerary.activities: Arrival and check-in at the hotel. Evening Seine River Cruise with dinner.
Morning visit to the Eiffel Tower and guided tour of the Louvre Museum.
Walking tour of Montmartre and visit to Notre-Dame Cathedral.
Full-day guided tour to Versailles Palace and Gardens.
Morning at leisure. Departure from Charles de Gaulle Airport.

inclusions: Priority access to the Eiffel Tower
Guided tours as per the itinerary
Dinner and show at the Moulin Rouge
exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
tips: Bring comfortable walking shoes for city tours.
Learn a few basic French phrases for easier communication.

80706b59-2ead-47bf-a089-4ddf0aaf92f2.title: Venice Weekend Escape
80706b59-2ead-47bf-a089-4ddf0aaf92f2.description: Enjoy a romantic weekend in Venice, exploring its winding canals, historic landmarks, and vibrant culture. Perfect for a short getaway to one of Italy's most iconic cities.
highlights: Gondola ride through the canals of Venice
Visit to St. Mark's Basilica and Doge's Palace
Explore the colorful streets of Burano
Sample Venetian cuisine at a local trattoria
Evening stroll across the Rialto Bridge

itinerary.activities: Arrival in Venice. Check-in at the hotel and evening gondola ride.
Morning visit to St. Mark's Basilica and Doge's Palace. Afternoon trip to Burano.
Free time for shopping and departure.

inclusions: Guided tours as per the itinerary
exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
tips: Wear comfortable shoes for exploring the city.
Try to learn a few basic Italian phrases.

056b6820-cf3f-45b1-b54f-3949d8c4253a.title: Tokyo Weekend Adventure
056b6820-cf3f-45b1-b54f-3949d8c4253a.description: Experience the excitement of Tokyo over a weekend. This tour offers a quick but immersive glimpse into Japan's bustling capital, from high-tech districts to serene gardens.
highlights: Visit to Tokyo Tower and Skytree
Explore the vibrant district of Akihabara

itinerary.activities: Arrival in Tokyo. Evening visit to Tokyo Tower and dinner at a local restaurant.
Morning visit to Akihabara. Afternoon stroll in Ueno Park and shopping in Shibuya.
Free time for exploring Harajuku and departure.

inclusions: Guided tours as per the itinerary
exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
tips: Use public transportation for easy access around the city.
Be respectful of local customs and etiquette.

7648efda-34a2-478e-a4b9-073b3dd05234.title: Barcelona Weekend Delight
7648efda-34a2-478e-a4b9-073b3dd05234.description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Barcelona. This weekend tour offers a glimpse into the artistic and architectural wonders of this iconic Spanish city.
highlights: Explore Park Güell and its artistic landscapes
Enjoy tapas in the Gothic Quarter

itinerary.activities: Arrival in Barcelona. Evening free for leisure.
Visit to Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. Evening tapas tour in the Gothic Quarter.
Visit to the Picasso Museum and free time for shopping on La Rambla before departure.

inclusions: Guided tours as per the itinerary
exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
tips: Explore local markets for unique souvenirs.
Take advantage of Barcelona's extensive public transport system.

9a6ad268-3806-4704-870b-9fef9838e512.title: Pacific Coast Highway Adventure
9a6ad268-3806-4704-870b-9fef9838e512.description: Experience the stunning vistas of California’s iconic coastal highway. This road trip takes you through breathtaking landscapes and charming seaside towns.
highlights: Drive along Big Sur’s rugged coastline

itinerary.activities: Arrive in San Francisco and pick up your rental car. Enjoy the evening in the city.
Drive to Monterey. Visit the Monterey Bay Aquarium.
Continue to Big Sur. Enjoy a scenic drive and hiking in the area.
Head to San Luis Obispo with a stop at Hearst Castle.
Explore Santa Barbara. Relax on the beach or visit the local wineries.
Drive to Los Angeles. Explore Hollywood and Santa Monica.
Visit Napa Valley for wine tasting before returning to San Francisco.

exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
tips: Keep your camera ready for breathtaking views along the route.
Try local seafood specialties in coastal towns.

4b0f420b-9c5c-4045-97ec-1f155841c622.title: The Great Ocean Road Trip
4b0f420b-9c5c-4045-97ec-1f155841c622.description: Embark on a journey along Australia’s Great Ocean Road, renowned for its stunning ocean views, rainforests, and surf beaches.
highlights: Discover wildlife at Great Otway National Park
Explore the charming town of Lorne

itinerary.activities: Depart from Melbourne and head to Torquay, the gateway to the Great Ocean Road.
Explore the coastal town of Lorne and enjoy a scenic drive to Apollo Bay.
Visit the Twelve Apostles and explore Great Otway National Park.
Continue to Warrnambool and visit the Shipwreck Coast.
Return to Melbourne with stops at picturesque coastal towns.

exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
tips: Look for koalas in the wild along the route.
Don’t miss the sunset at the Twelve Apostles.

607a8735-04f5-4c00-9031-3f3f511488a1.title: New Zealand South Island Expedition
607a8735-04f5-4c00-9031-3f3f511488a1.description: Discover the majestic landscapes of New Zealand’s South Island with this immersive road trip experience, featuring fjords, glaciers, and lush forests.
highlights: Hike in Mount Cook National Park

itinerary.activities: Arrive in Christchurch. Explore the city’s botanical gardens.
Drive to Lake Tekapo and enjoy the stunning views.
Visit Mount Cook National Park for hiking and exploration.
Head to Queenstown, the adventure capital of New Zealand.
Experience adventure activities in Queenstown, such as bungee jumping.
Take a scenic drive to Te Anau, the gateway to Fiordland.
Cruise on Milford Sound and explore Fiordland National Park.
Drive to Franz Josef Glacier and explore the glacier region.
Visit the Punakaiki Pancake Rocks on the way to Greymouth.
Return to Christchurch via Arthur’s Pass.

inclusions: 9 nights’ accommodation in hotels and lodges
exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
tips: Bring layers for changing weather conditions.
Book adventure activities in Queenstown in advance.

30f29304-4093-424c-98a8-530d85098d11.title: Egyptian Pyramids and Cairo Experience
30f29304-4093-424c-98a8-530d85098d11.description: Explore the wonders of ancient Egypt, including the iconic pyramids and the vibrant city of Cairo. Discover the rich history and culture of one of the world's oldest civilizations.
highlights: Visit the Great Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx
Explore the Egyptian Museum in Cairo
Tour the historic Islamic Cairo district
Visit the ancient city of Memphis

itinerary.activities: Arrival in Cairo and check-in at the hotel. Evening welcome dinner.
Visit the Great Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx. Explore the Solar Boat Museum.
Tour the Egyptian Museum and enjoy a Nile River dinner cruise.
Explore Islamic Cairo, including the Citadel and Khan el-Khalili bazaar.
Day trip to the ancient city of Memphis and Saqqara.
Free day for leisure or optional tours.
Depart Cairo for your flight home.

inclusions: Entry tickets to attractions as per itinerary
Guided tours with a professional Egyptologist
exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
tips: Bring comfortable walking shoes for exploring sites.
Try local Egyptian cuisine at recommended restaurants.

3e219f6f-125d-4a22-9739-39105eb9cde5.title: Inca Trail to Machu Picchu
3e219f6f-125d-4a22-9739-39105eb9cde5.description: Embark on a once-in-a-lifetime adventure along the Inca Trail to Machu Picchu. Experience the history and culture of the Incan Empire.
highlights: Explore the Sacred Valley of the Incas

itinerary.activities: Arrive in Cusco and acclimate to the altitude. Evening briefing.
Tour the city of Cusco and nearby ruins.
Explore the Sacred Valley, including Pisac and Ollantaytambo.
Start the Inca Trail hike. Camp at Wayllabamba.
Hike through the stunning Andean landscape to Pacaymayo.
Continue the trek to Wiñay Wayna.
Arrive at Machu Picchu for a guided tour. Return to Cusco.
Depart Cusco for your flight home.

inclusions: 7 nights’ accommodation in hotels and camps
Inca Trail permit and entrance to Machu Picchu
Guided tours with a local guide
exclusions: Meals not mentioned in the itinerary
tips: Bring a refillable water bottle and snacks for the hike.
Consider acclimatization tours in Cusco before the trek.
